alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:56PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Pueblo County through 445 PM MDT... At 355 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking the leading edge of strong winds, accompanying isolated thunderstorms, along a line extending from 10 miles southwest of Salt Creek to near Pinon. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pueblo, Pueblo Reservoir, Salt Creek, Blende, Avondale, Pueblo West, Pueblo Depot and Pinon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
